content.body: Oh god, I finally have a real use for `Symbol.species`: to simulate async contexts.
content.formatted_body: Oh god, I finally have a real use for Symbol.species: to simulate async contexts.

Oh god, I finally have a real use for Symbol.species: to simulate async contexts.

content.body: Nope, don't need `species` at all, just need to patch `Promise.prototype.then` and you get all the benefits.
content.formatted_body: Nope, don't need species at all, just need to patch Promise.prototype.then and you get all the benefits.
